attributes.action: Ensure all aquatic live stock is sold by fully trained staff.
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure all aquatic live stock is sold by fully trained staff who are required by law to give advice and ensure the through conversation that the livestock are going to a suitable home and the purchaser knows how to look after them properly.

This has come about through noticing how many beginners to the hobby result in killing their new fish because of poor or no advice from pet shops and aquatic shops.

An example new tank sold can put fish in next day but not told thats a fish in cycle
attributes.background: Ensure all aquatic live stock is sold by fully trained staff who are required by law to give advice and ensure the through conversation that the livestock are going to a suitable home and the purchaser knows how to look after them properly.

rejection.details:
We think this petition would have the same result
